FuncDef: The radius-server traffic-unit command sets the traffic unit used by a RADIUS server. The undo radius-server traffic-unit command restores the default traffic unit used by a RADIUS server. The default RADIUS traffic unit is byte on the device.
CLIs: radius-server traffic-unit { byte | kbyte | mbyte | gbyte }

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the traffic unit is byte.
-

Indicates that the traffic unit is kilobyte.
-

Indicates that the traffic unit is megabyte.
-

Indicates that the traffic unit is gigabyte.
-
